title: Spring 2025 Kickoff Meeting
description: Join us for our spring semester kickoff! Meet the team, learn about upcoming events, and connect with fellow aerospace enthusiasts.

title: Industry Talk: Boeing Canada
description: Hear from Boeing Canada engineers about career paths in aerospace, current projects, and what it takes to succeed in the industry.

title: SolidWorks CAD Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop covering aerospace component design in SolidWorks. Perfect for beginners and intermediate users looking to improve their CAD skills.

title: MDA Space Facility Tour
description: Exclusive tour of MDA Space facilities. See Canadarm technology up close and learn about Canada's contributions to space exploration.

title: Fall 2024 Networking Mixer
description: End-of-semester celebration with industry professionals, alumni, and current members. Great food, great conversations.

title: Workshop: Rocket Propulsion Basics
description: Introduction to rocket propulsion fundamentals. Covered liquid vs solid propellants, thrust equations, and design considerations.
